seo.title: AI Document Processing for Law Firm Case Management — Dodonai
seo.description: Integrate AI-powered document processing into your law firm's case management workflow. Automate deposition summaries, medical chronologies, transcript search, and document organization.

hero.headline: AI Document Processing That Fits Your Case Management Workflow
hero.subheadline: Law firms manage hundreds of active cases, each generating thousands of pages of records, transcripts, and correspondence. Dodonai automates the document-heavy tasks that slow your team down — producing deposition summaries, medical chronologies, transcript search results, and structured extracts in minutes so your case files stay organized and your attorneys stay focused on strategy.

sections.heading: Why Law Firms Are Adding AI to Their Case Management Stack
paragraphs: Case management is fundamentally a document management problem. Every case involves gathering records, organizing evidence, summarizing testimony, tracking deadlines, and producing work product. The firms that process documents faster gain a measurable advantage in case throughput, cost control, and client outcomes.

Most case management platforms handle the organizational layer — contacts, calendars, tasks, and file storage. But they leave the actual document processing to your team. Someone still has to read through a 300-page deposition transcript, summarize a plaintiff's medical records, extract key data from discovery documents, and format everything for attorney review. This is where the majority of paralegal and associate time goes, and it is where AI delivers the greatest return.

Dodonai plugs into your existing case management workflow as the document processing layer. Upload files from your case management system, and Dodonai returns structured outputs — {{link:/deposition-summary-software/|deposition summaries}}, {{link:/ai-medical-record-summaries-chronologies/|medical chronologies}}, {{link:/ai-deposition-transcript-software/|searchable transcripts}}, and {{link:/dodonai-extract-and-draft-agents/|custom extracts}} — that your team can drop directly into case files, demand letters, discovery responses, and trial binders.
This is not a replacement for your case management platform. It is the processing engine that makes everything inside your case management system more useful, more organized, and more accessible.

sections.heading: Dodonai Tools for Law Firm Case Management

cards.title: Deposition Summary Generation
cards.description: Upload deposition transcripts and receive page-line or narrative summaries in minutes. Highlight key topics to tailor each summary to the issues that matter for your case, then file the output directly in your case management system.

cards.title: Medical Record Chronologies
cards.description: Process plaintiff medical records into structured chronologies with provider timelines, diagnoses, treatments, and source citations. Organized medical evidence accelerates demand letter preparation, case valuation, and trial preparation.

cards.title: AI-Powered Transcript Search
cards.description: Search across multiple deposition transcripts simultaneously using natural language queries. Find specific testimony about liability, damages, or expert opinions without re-reading entire transcripts — saving hours of attorney and paralegal time per case.

cards.title: Document Organization at Scale
cards.description: Process large volumes of discovery documents with {{link:/ai-pdf-ocr/|AI OCR}} and extract structured data from even scanned or handwritten files. Dodonai handles the document types that slow down manual review the most.

cards.title: Extract and Draft Agents
cards.description: Build reusable {{link:/dodonai-extract-and-draft-agents/|Extract and Draft Agents}} that pull specific data points from documents and generate formatted outputs. Create agents for recurring tasks like insurance policy extraction, billing summaries, or witness statement organization.

cards.title: E-Discovery Integration
cards.description: Use Dodonai's {{link:/electronic-discovery-software/|e-discovery tools}} to search, filter, and review large document sets produced in discovery. Reduce the volume of documents that require manual attorney review while ensuring nothing relevant gets missed.

items.title: Upload Case Documents
items.description: Upload deposition transcripts, medical records, discovery documents, or any other case files to Dodonai's secure platform. The system accepts PDFs, Word files, text files, and scanned documents. No preprocessing or reformatting is required.

items.title: AI Processes and Structures the Content
items.description: Select the output type you need — deposition summary, medical chronology, transcript search, document extract, or e-discovery review — and Dodonai's AI processes the documents accordingly. Add key topics, date ranges, or specific focus areas to customize the output for your case.

items.title: Export to Your Case Management System
items.description: Download the finished work product as PDF, Word, Excel, or plain text and add it to your case file. Every output includes source-linked citations so attorneys can verify any data point against the original documents during review.

faq.question: Does Dodonai replace our case management software?
faq.answer: No. Dodonai is a document processing tool that complements your existing case management platform. It handles the AI-powered summarization, search, and extraction tasks that case management software does not do. You continue to use your current platform for contacts, calendars, task tracking, and file storage. Dodonai processes the documents and delivers structured outputs that you save into your case management system.

faq.question: What types of documents can Dodonai process for our cases?
faq.answer: Dodonai processes deposition transcripts, medical records, discovery documents, contracts, correspondence, and virtually any other PDF or Word file relevant to litigation. The platform includes {{link:/ai-pdf-ocr/|AI-powered OCR}} for scanned and handwritten documents, so you can upload files exactly as you receive them.

faq.question: How does Dodonai handle security for law firm documents?
faq.answer: Dodonai is SOC 2 Type II certified and HIPAA compliant. All documents are encrypted in transit and at rest using AES-256 encryption. Your data is never used to train AI models, and you retain full control over data retention and deletion. We sign Business Associate Agreements for firms handling protected health information.

faq.question: Can multiple attorneys and paralegals use the same Dodonai account?
faq.answer: Yes. Dodonai supports team accounts where multiple users can upload documents, access summaries, and manage work product. All users share the same credit pool, and administrators can manage team access and monitor usage across the firm.

faq.question: How much does Dodonai cost for a law firm?
faq.answer: Plans start at $30 per month for 200 pages of document processing (Lite plan). The Basic plan is $60 per month for 1,000 pages, and the Pro plan is $100 per month for 5,000 pages. Enterprise plans with custom page volumes and dedicated support are available for larger firms. Visit our {{link:/pricing/|pricing page}} for full details.

faq.question: What is the learning curve for integrating Dodonai into our workflow?
faq.answer: Most law firms are fully operational within a day. The upload-and-download workflow is straightforward, and no technical setup is required. Upload a document, select the output type, and download the result. Paralegals and associates typically need no formal training beyond an initial walkthrough of the platform.
